org.apache.flink.runtime.io.network.partition.consumer

类 BufferOrEvent

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.apache.flink.runtime.io.network.partition.consumer.BufferOrEvent

  • public class BufferOrEvent
extends java.lang.Object
    Either type for Buffer or AbstractEvent instances tagged with the channel index, from which they were received.

    • 字段概要

      字段 
      限定符和类型 字段和说明
      private Buffer buffer 
      private int channelIndex 
      private AbstractEvent event 
      private boolean moreAvailable
      Indicate availability of further instances for the union input gate.

    • 字段详细资料

      • buffer

        private final Buffer buffer

      • event

        private final AbstractEvent event

      • moreAvailable

        private final boolean moreAvailable
        Indicate availability of further instances for the union input gate. This is not needed outside of the input gate unioning logic and cannot be set outside of the consumer package.

      • channelIndex

        private int channelIndex
